name: Hotel Silence
description:
Imagine the situation, you wake up in a hotel room and your mouth has been sewn shut.
Your only contact with the outside world is a single number on a mobile phone.
This is the situation the hero of the game finds himself in, in the grim story of "hotel silence".
Help him escape from this nightmare and find the cause of what is happening.
The game features a non linear plot line and your every action and decision affects the outcome of the story.

Make your choices carefully because death lurks round every corner.

Total immersion, the interactions and behaviour of the main character, the music and sound effects create an atmosphere of pure terror.

Replay factor - play again and again learning more and more about the main character and the secrets of "hotel silence".
